name: Evalgator
description: Evalgator is an AI-powered platform for candidate assessment and recruitment, featuring modules for applicant tracking, comprehensive assessments, and collaborative coding interviews. Leveraging AI and automation, Evalgator streamlines hiring processes while maintaining assessment integrity and hire quality. User-friendly and competitively priced, it serves technical and non-technical hiring needs with versatility, making it an ideal solution for various assessment requirements.
business_objectives: Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
Headline: All-in-one Talent Assessment Platform
ShortDescription: Evalgator is a candidate assessment platform built to make screening efficient and effortless

Highlights.name: Assessments
Highlights.description: Our online assessment plans can be tailor-fit to your needs.

Highlights.name: Interviews
Highlights.description: Interview candidates anywhere on the globe keeping your cost to hire low.

Highlights.name: Recruit
Highlights.description: Reduce your cost to hire with an affordable all-in-one applicant tracking system.

enhanced_description: Evalgator is an AI-powered, all-in-one talent assessment platform designed to streamline candidate screening and recruitment processes. It features modules for comprehensive assessments, collaborative coding interviews, and an affordable applicant tracking system (ATS). Leveraging AI and automation, including AI-based grammar checks and automatic face verification, Evalgator ensures assessment integrity and high hire quality. It is user-friendly, competitively priced, and versatile, serving both technical and non-technical hiring needs for small, large, and global enterprises. The platform aims to help organizations hire top talent faster, more efficiently, and at a reduced cost.
competitive_advantages: Versatility for technical and non-technical hiring needs
